text: haey mean ke niyeay towkean banda anak del kaotakhlach tha tae mcheasa robsa puok anak ban banhchouh avei( tow aoy mou ham meat)? puokke ban chhlaey tha kuchea rueng la . samreab banda anak del ban sang ampeu la now leu lokey nih ku ttuol ban phl la . haey champoh lomnow dthan nea thngai barlok vinh ku rutte brasaer cheang nih towtiet . haey lomnow dthan( thansuokr) robsa banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh noh ku pitchea la brasaer bamphot
